doc.title: EMBOSS

description.text: European Molecular Biology Open Software Suite

doc.reference: EMBOSS: The European Molecular Biology Open Software Suite (2000) Rice,P. Longden,I. and Bleasby, A. Trends in Genetics 16, (6) pp276--277

description.text: Draws linear maps of DNA constructs

fieldset.title: This parameter is mandatory
fieldset.legend: Commands to the lindna drawing program file

xhtml:div.label: Maximum number of groups (value greater than or equal to 1)
Maximum number of labels (value greater than or equal to 1)
Draw a ruler Yes No
Type of blocks Open blocks Filled blocks Black border
Type of junctions between blocks Straight Up Down No
Colour of junctions between blocks (enter a colour number) (value from 0 to 15)
Horizontal junctions between ticks Yes No
Interval between ticks in the ruler (value greater than or equal to 0)
Vertical lines at the ruler's ticks Yes No

Height of text multiplier (value greater than or equal to 0.0)?
Height of text. Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

Length of text multiplier (value greater than or equal to 0.0)?
Length of text. Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

Width of left margin multiplier (value greater than or equal to 0.0)?
Width of left margin. This is the region left to the groups where the names of the groups are displayed. Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

Height of ticks multiplier (value greater than or equal to 0.0)?
Height of ticks. Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

Height of blocks multilpier (value greater than or equal to 0.0)?
Height of blocks. Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

Height of range ends multiplier (value greater than or equal to 0.0)?
Height of range ends. Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

Space between groups mutliplier (value greater than or equal to 0.0)?
Space between groups. Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

Space between text and ticks, blocks, and ranges multiplier (value greater than or equal to 0.0)?
Space between text and ticks, blocks, and ranges. Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively
Choose the e_graphout output format Png Gif Cps Ps Meta Data
Name of the output graph

Length of text. Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

Space between groups. Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively
Space between text and ticks, blocks, and ranges. Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

parameter.name: e_infile
parameter.prompt: Commands to the lindna drawing program file

format.code: ("", " -infile=" + str(value))[value is not None ]

xhtml:fieldset.xhtml:legend: Commands to the lindna drawing program file

parameter.name: e_maxgroups
parameter.prompt: Maximum number of groups (value greater than or equal to 1)

format.code: ("", " -maxgroups=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

message.text: Value greater than or equal to 1 is required

interface.label: Maximum number of groups (value greater than or equal to 1)

parameter.name: e_maxlabels
parameter.prompt: Maximum number of labels (value greater than or equal to 1)

format.code: ("", " -maxlabels=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

message.text: Value greater than or equal to 1 is required

interface.label: Maximum number of labels (value greater than or equal to 1)

parameter.name: e_ruler
parameter.prompt: Draw a ruler

format.code: (" -noruler", "")[ bool(value) ]

parameter.name: e_blocktype
parameter.prompt: Type of blocks

format.code: ("", " -blocktype=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

interface.label: Type of blocks Open blocks Filled blocks Black border

parameter.name: e_intersymbol
parameter.prompt: Type of junctions between blocks

format.code: ("", " -intersymbol=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

interface.label: Type of junctions between blocks Straight Up Down No

parameter.name: e_intercolour
parameter.prompt: Colour of junctions between blocks (enter a colour number) (value from 0 to 15)

format.code: ("", " -intercolour=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

message.text: Value greater than or equal to 0 is required
Value less than or equal to 15 is required

interface.label: Colour of junctions between blocks (enter a colour number) (value from 0 to 15)

parameter.name: e_interticks
parameter.prompt: Horizontal junctions between ticks

format.code: ("", " -interticks")[ bool(value) ]

interface.label: Horizontal junctions between ticks Yes No

parameter.name: e_gapsize
parameter.prompt: Interval between ticks in the ruler (value greater than or equal to 0)

format.code: ("", " -gapsize=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

message.text: Value greater than or equal to 0 is required

interface.label: Interval between ticks in the ruler (value greater than or equal to 0)

parameter.name: e_ticklines
parameter.prompt: Vertical lines at the ruler's ticks

format.code: ("", " -ticklines")[ bool(value) ]

interface.label: Vertical lines at the ruler's ticks Yes No

parameter.name: e_textheight
parameter.prompt: Height of text multiplier (value greater than or equal to 0.0)

format.code: ("", " -textheight=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

message.text: Value greater than or equal to 0.0 is required

comment.text: Height of text. Enter a number <1.0 or >1.0 to decrease or increase the size, respectively

parameter.name: e_graphout
parameter.prompt: Choose the e_graphout output format

format.code: (" -graphout=" + str(vdef), " -graphout=" + str(value))[value is not None and value!=vdef]

interface.label: Choose the e_graphout output format Png Gif Cps Ps Meta Data

parameter.name: e_goutfile
parameter.prompt: Name of the output graph

format.code: ("" , " -goutfile=" + str(value))[value is not None]

parameter.prompt: Graph file

parameter.prompt: Graph file

parameter.prompt: Graph file

parameter.name: auto
parameter.prompt: Turn off any prompting

format.code: " -auto -stdout"
